Reviews.Title: New is not better !
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: The hp 425 I had befor actually took alot sharper photos ! This camera is OK,,,,,but I just saw on E-Bay a HP 425and snagged it instantly !!! if you want a really nice EASY TO USE little companion.Get a HP-425.Out dated or nota far better camera in my Opinion.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good ....
Reviews.Author: Robin G. Burchfield
Reviews.Content: I haven't had the chance to use it as much as I plan to with the holidays coming up, but it's been easy to learn and easy to use. I wanted something simple and something simple to upload for friends and family. This is the one to get if you don't want to worry about your picture taking this holiday season.

ProductInfo.Features:
High burst mode
Anti shaking
red eye reduction   Optical image stabilizer
ProductInfo.Name: HP HP-P550 16MP Digital Camera with 12.5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD Screen (Black)
